column4: anyonw know how I can install this?  I have successfully downloaded the package with wget and uncompressed it.. Now what? http://packages.ubuntu.com/source/lucid/msttcorefonts
btw, why do you want those ms-ttfs on a server?
if you really need that package, ask your admin to install it
are there any known problems or hassles with the 64-bit version vs the 32-bit version?
